---
title: "Example article on how to use templates"
author: "Frank Loesche"
institute: "Plymouth University"
date: "7 February 2017"
abstract:
  It is not particularly difficult to output the content of Markdown and RMarkdown files directly into a desired template. This current example uses a very simple template, following the APA recommendations. The files apa.template and apa-simple.template are modified versions of sample articles, the content comes from this document.
keywords: 
- R
- RMarkdown
- APA
- LaTeX
- template
output:
  pdf_document:
    template: "apa.template"
bibliography: MyBibliography.bib
---
